name: Atlas Aviation
about: Atlas Aviation, established in 2002 in Florida, is a premier provider of airport services and flight training. Founded by President and Founder Deric Dymerski, the company operates full-service Fixed Base Operations (FBOs) and flight schools at Peter O. Knight Airport in Tampa and Plant City Airport. As a Cessna Pilot Center and Cirrus Training Center, Atlas Aviation offers individualized flight instruction using state-of-the-art training programs. The school provides a diverse fleet of rental aircraft, including Cessna 162 SkyCatchers, Cessna 172SP Skyhawks, Cessna 182T Skylanes, and Cirrus SR-22 GTS. With a commitment to professional service, Atlas Aviation also offers comprehensive line services, aircraft maintenance, and rental options 24 hours a day. Dedicated to excellence, Atlas Aviation is the go-to destination for aviation needs in the Tampa Bay area.
